rule.q: Is visual line of sight required?

answer: Maximum altitude is 400 feet AGL unless within 400 feet of a structure. Maintain visual line of sight (VLOS) with the aircraft at all times.

citations.text: Maintain visual line of sight (VLOS) with the aircraft at all times.
Maximum altitude is 400 feet AGL unless within 400 feet of a structure.
Yield right of way to manned aircraft.
Do not operate under the influence of drugs or alcohol.

spans.text: Maximum altitude is 400 feet AGL unless within 400 feet of a structure. Maintain visual line of sight (VLOS) with the aircraft at all times.
Yield right of way to manned aircraft. Do not operate under the influence of drugs or alcohol.
